  # eth_blobBaseFee



  Returns the base fee per blob gas in wei.

  ## Parameters (by position)

  This method does not accept any parameters.

  ## Result

  **Blob gas base fee** `string`

  Blob gas base fee

  *Match pattern:* `^0x(0|[1-9a-f][0-9a-f]*)$`

  ***
